scripts.dev: concurrently "npx nodemon --exec babel-node api/index.js" "webpack serve --open --config web/webpack.dev.js"
scripts.build: rimraf build && babel api --ignore node_modules,test --out-dir build --copy-files && webpack --config web/webpack.prod.js
scripts.start:container: rimraf build && babel . --ignore node_modules,test --out-dir build --copy-files && ls && node build/index.js
